text:
Local Government Order 2003

After consultation with the Central Highlands Council and being satisfied that it is appropriate to do so, I make the following order under section 140(2) of the Local Government Act 1993 .

21 May 2003

J. G. Cox

Minister Assisting the Premier on Local Government

1. Short title
    This order may be cited as the Local Government Order 2003 .

2. Commencement
    This order takes effect on the day on which its making is notified in the Gazette.

3. Transfer of land to council
    The land situated at Ellendale Road at Westerway in Tasmania comprised in Volume 573191, Folio 1 of the register kept under section 33 of the Land Titles Act 1980 is to be transferred to the Central Highlands Council.

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 4 June 2003

This order is administered in the Department of Premier and Cabinet.
